Body:
Description: We generated a healthcheck report and when examining the details of a privilege for some objetcs we see a legend that says:
"RESTRICETEDTOUSER 
The permission described above is restricted to Users"
We cant find details on what this means on the ACL for the object, and when this legend appears the privilege mentioned is not seen on the ACL.
Can we get some clarification on why this legend appears and how we can see it on the ACL of the object?
Steps to Reproduce Updated: ACL restrictedtouser detected on object
What We've Learned Updated: If a privilege is marked as "RESTRICTEDTOUSER," it might mean that the raw ACL contains permissions that apply only when a user interacts with the object
Next Steps Updated: awaiting screenshots of permissions of said object and the health check report

Description Updated: We generated a healthcheck report and noticed a legend that says:
"RESTRICTEDTOUSER
The permission described above is restricted to Users."

However, we cannot find any details about this in the ACL for the object, and when this legend appears, the corresponding privilege is not visible in the ACL.

Could we please get clarification on why this legend appears and how we can view it in the ACL of the object?
